original_title: Namie Amuro Best Tour Live Style 2006
overview: The Live Style 2006 tour lasted from August 13, 2006 to November 23, 2006 and marked the 15th anniversary of her career. The set list included many of her b-side singles and is as follows: - Violet Sauce - Handle Me - Without Me - Fish - A Walk in the Park - Say the Word - Put 'Em Up - Alarm - No More Tears - Strobe - Exist for You - Four Seasons - Ningyo - Lovin' It - Drive - Girl Talk - Can't Sleep, Can't Eat, I'm Sick - Do or Die - Uh Uh... - How To Be a Girl - Want Me, Want Me - Shine More - The Speed Star - Body Feels Exit - Chase the Chance - Can't Sleep, Can't Eat, I'm Sick (remix).
title: Namie Amuro Best Tour Live Style 2006
